User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user in the system with access to specific functionalities.

id.description: Unique identifier for the User entity. (Same as Firebase Auth UID)

BankStatus.title: BankStatus
BankStatus.description: Represents the status of a bank proposal insertion for a specific user.

categories.description: Categories of the bank (e.g., CLT, FGTS, GOV, INSS, Custom).

category.description: Category of the bank (e.g., CLT, FGTS, GOV, INSS, Custom).

status.description: Current status of the proposal insertion.

insertionDate.description: Timestamp when the proposal was marked as 'Concluído'.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the bank status was created.

CLTRule.title: CLTRule
CLTRule.description: Represents a specific business rule for CLT calculations or validations, associated with a specific bank.

id.description: Unique identifier for the CLT Rule.

ruleName.description: The name or title of the rule (e.g., 'Tempo de Admissão').

ruleValue.description: The value or condition for the rule (e.g., '6 meses').

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the rule was created.

definition.description: Stores user profile information, including their role. Secured by requiring `request.auth.uid == userId`.

params.name: userId
params.description: The unique identifier for the user.

definition.description: Stores the master list of banks available in the system. Writable only by 'master' role, readable by all authenticated users.

params.name: bankStatusId
params.description: The unique identifier for the bank status entry.

definition.description: Stores CLT rules for a specific bank. Writable only by 'master' role, readable by all authenticated users.

params.name: ruleId
params.description: The unique identifier for the CLT rule.

definition.description: Stores the user-specific checklist status for each bank. Each user can only access their own checklist.

params.name: userId
params.description: The unique identifier for the user.

params.name: checklistId
params.description: The unique identifier for the bank checklist entry, likely matching the bankStatusId.
